entry.title: Spring Stripe Pajama - Short Sleeve BLUE
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 14.75

2 piece pajama set - 95% Cotton 5% Spandex 

This style does have a slight flare in the body of the top. This could be considered a feminine cut. 

Please review the size charts and when in doubt size up! Please keep in mind that the size chart number is based on the pyjamas lying flat on a table and being measured one side.

We are hearing that the children's sizes are fairly true to size but you may wish to size up if you are unsure. Safety regulations do recommend pyjamas fit close to the body. 

No refunds if you ordered the wrong size.

 

No refunds if you ordered the wrong size.

entry.title: Nordic Reindeer Pattern Family Pajamas
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 17.00 - 23.00 (28 variants)

2 piece pajama set. Amazing quality 95% cotton 5% spandex.

Children size 3-6M, 6-9M, 9-12M, 12-18M are one-piece romper style pajamas.

Size 18-24M and up are all 2 piece pajamas.

We find these fit very true to size.

Please review the size charts and when in doubt size up! 

No refunds if you ordered the wrong size. 

(F1002)

entry.title: Black Raglan Sleeve/Buffalo Plaid Pants Family Pajamas - POLYESTER for Sub
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 17.00 - 23.00 (20 variants)

2 piece pajama set - Shirt is 100% Polyester

Perfect for Sublimation!

Please review the size charts and when in doubt size up! Please keep in mind that the size chart number is based on the pajamas lying flat on a table and being measured on one side.

We are hearing that the children's sizes are true to size but that larger adult sizes fit close to the body. If you want a loose fit or are in doubt, size up.

This style does have a scoop neckline that becomes more obvious as you move up into the plus sizes. While considered unisex, many feel this gives this style a very feminine look.

180C degrees for 60 seconds

No refunds if you ordered the wrong size. 

Adult sizes are only available up to 3xl at this time.

entry.title: Green Polka Dot Drawstring with Side Pockets **LIMITED Pajama Bottom
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 16.95

Bottoms only! 

Featuring deep side slit pockets and a drawstring/elastic waistband. 

Fabric :75% polyester ,20% cotton ,5% spandex 

These are in-stock but this is a special holiday buy and they cannot be re-ordered. When they are sold out, they are gone. 

Please follow the size chart. No refunds if you ordered the wrong size. 

These fit true to size (TTS) or slightly big. 

**these are not available in red with white polka dot, that is just to show you the details.

entry.title: Halloween Stripped Family Pajamas
entry.summary:
Vendor: Design Blanks
Type:
Price: 15.50 - 21.50 (5 variants)

 2 piece pajama set - 95% Cotton 5% Spandex 

Please review the size charts and when in doubt size up! Please keep in mind that the size chart number is based on the pajamas lying flat on a table and being measured on one side.

We are hearing that the children's sizes are true to size but that larger adult sizes fit close to the body. If you want a loose fit or are in doubt, size up.

This style does have a mild scoop neckline that becomes more obvious as you move up into the plus sizes. While considered unisex, many feel this gives this style a feminine look.

No refunds if you ordered the wrong size. 

These require production time as they are being made for us specifically.

You will not be charged additional buy-in fee or customs fees on this product. You will be required to pay tax and shipping. As always orders over $125 within Ontario and $165 out of Ontario will ship free.

Please do not order in stock items with pre-order items if you are not ok to wait for everything to ship at one time. We will not split orders and ship items separately.
